General.Name: YAMATO HOLDINGS
General.Description: Yamato Holdings Co., Ltd. provides delivery, logistics, home convenience, e-business, financial, auto works, and other related services in Japan and internationally. The company's Delivery segment offers small parcel delivery services for the general public and corporations centering on TA-Q-BIN; and value-added services, such as Cool TA-Q-BIN and TA-Q-BIN Collect. Its BIZ-Logistics segment handles logistics and other B2B distribution operations. The company's Home Convenience segment offers lifestyle support services; and installs electrical appliances for customers. Its e-Business segment provides information services for corporations, including ASP services and information system development. The company's Financial segment offers settlement and other financial services to consumers and business customers; and various settlement methods, including payment on delivery and payment by credit card. Its Autoworks segment provides trucks and other vehicles maintenance services for transport companies. The company also provides various shared services, including highway transportation and personnel placement services. Yamato Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

0.Name: Mr. Masaki  Yamauchi
0.Title: Chairperson of the Board of Directors
